casebody.data:
Hixson, Appellant, v. Callentine et al.; Westport Insurance Company, Appellee.

[Cite as Hixson v. Callentine, 107 Ohio St.3d 1208, 2005-Ohio-6508.]

(No. 2005-0290 Submitted October 12, 2005 Decided December 28, 2005.) Steven G. Thomakos, L.L.C., and Steven G. Thomakos, for appellant. Ulmer & Berne, L.L.P., David L. Lester, and David L. Eidelberg; Schindel, Farman & Lipsius, L.L.P., and Laurence J. Rabinovich, for appellee. Davis & Young and Richard M. Garner, urging affirmance for amicus curiae, Avis Rent A Car System, Inc.

{¶ 1} The certification of conflict is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently certified; there is a want of a conflict.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell and Lanzinger, JJ., concur.
